translations: v.恢复（某种情况或感受）；使复原，使复位；修复，整修；重新采用，恢复使用；归还

sentences.sentence: Troops were sent in to restore order.
The police are trying to restore public order.
sentences.translation: 警察正在努力恢复公共秩序。

sentences.sentence: We will restore her to health but it may take time.
sentences.translation: 我们会让她恢复健康，但这或许需要时间。
